name: Replit
description: Browser-based coding platform for rapid prototyping and deployment of small applications. Replit is a collaborative, browser-based integrated development environment (IDE). It allows users to write, run, and deploy code instantly from any device without setup. Founded by Amjad Masad, Replit aims to democratize coding. It is particularly popular for rapid prototyping and education.
journalism_relevance: Perfect for quick, public-facing projects. Example: A Moldovan newsroom wants to build a simple "Inflation Calculator" for their readers. Replit's "AI Agent" can build and host this in 10 minutes.
